[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@amadeus-it-group/tansu](./tansu.md) &gt; [StoreOptions](./tansu.storeoptions.md)

## StoreOptions interface

Store options that can be passed to [readable()](./tansu.readable.md) or [writable()](./tansu.writable.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StoreOptions<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [notEqual?](./tansu.storeoptions.notequal.md) |  | (a: T, b: T) =&gt; boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Custom function to compare two values, that should return true if they are different. It is called when setting a new value to avoid doing anything (such as notifying listeners) if the value did not change. The default logic (when this option is not present) is to return true if <code>a</code> is a function or an object, or if <code>a</code> and <code>b</code> are different according to <code>Object.is</code>. |
|  [onUse?](./tansu.storeoptions.onuse.md) |  | [OnUseFn](./tansu.onusefn.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A function that is called when the number of subscribers changes from 0 to 1 (but not called when the number of subscribers changes from 1 to 2, ...). If it returns a function, that function will be called when the number of subscribers changes from 1 to 0. |
